Shanshan Zhang

PhD candidate @ Temple University
I live in Philadelphia, PA, USA. I am a PhD candidate in Computer Science studying at the Department of Computer & Information Sciences, Temple University. My advisor is Slobodan Vucetic. Prior to Temple, I recieved B.Sc. in Software Engineering and M.Sc. in Computer Science from Wuhan University, China. My research area is Human-in-the-loop AI (Entity Extraction, Value Normalization, Behavioral Data Modeling, Healthcare, Material Sciences) and Machine Learning (Structural Regression, Interpretable (Bi-)LSTM, Graph NNs, Character Seq2seq NNs). I share broad interest in mining insights from data. Here is my most recent resume.

Graduating!

Posted on January 10, 2019

I am going to graduate Spring 2019, how exciting!
